title._content: [Lieutenant William Sharpe Barnes, F Company, 4th North Carolina Infantry in frock coat] (LOC)

description._content: [Lieutenant William Sharpe Barnes, F Company, 4th North Carolina Infantry in frock coat] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.5 x 6.4 cm (case) + Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 2-86. Inscription on handwritten note: "William Sharpe Barnes, 19 yrs. old ... father of R. I. Barnes." Photograph shows identified soldier, William Sharpe Barnes, who enlisted in 1861 as a corporal. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: Bryan Watson, Civil War Images, Torrington, Wyoming, 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Barnes, William Sharpe. Confederate States of America.--Army.--North Carolina Infantry Regiment, 4th.--Company F--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31454 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2697
